basics.name: Gilang Gumilar
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I love to solve problems using computer code. Life-long learner.

work.summary: Traveloka is an Indonesian unicorn company that provides airline ticketing, hotel booking services, and lifestyle products. I work as a full-stack engineer building Axes for Biz which is a public self-onboard platform of Traveloka Xperience products.
highlights: Maintain and implement UI forms. (ReactJS, Next.js)
Improved the landing page performance (Lighthouse audit) by 154%. (ReactJS, Chrome DevTools)
Design and implement database models and backend services. (PostgreSQL, Java)
Implement a CI/CD of the static web frontend. (AWS, Terraform, Next.js)

work.summary: Bukalapak is an Indonesian unicorn company and one of the leading online marketplaces in Indonesia.
highlights: Implemented an internal dashboard of Core Trust and Safety team. (Vue.js, VueX, Vuetify, Express.js)
Implemented a Vue UI Component Library. (Vue.js, Storybook, Jest, SASS)
Maintained the mobile web (Vue.js, VueX, Nuxt.js), centralized front-end documentation (Express.js), and front-end data tracking utility. (JavaScript)

work.summary: GoriTax is a curated tax and accounting experts as a service.
highlights: Designed the database (SQL, PostgreSQL), created the back-end with a RESTful API (Python, Django, Django REST framework), and created the server infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Kops, Gitlab CI/CD).
Implemented the front-end with a front-end engineer. (ReactJS, Redux, Material-UI)

work.summary: Bukalapak is an Indonesian unicorn company and one of the leading online marketplaces in Indonesia.
highlights: Rewrote the product detail page on the mobile web using Vue.js and RESTful API. (Vue.js, VueX, Nuxt.js)

work.company: Computer Science Faculty of Universitas Indonesia
work.summary: Assisted the lecturer of Web Design and Programming (International Class) course.
highlights: Created weekly lab tutorials with other assistants.

work.summary: Jojonomic provides services that can easily control company expenses with Real-Time Approval.
highlights: Developed web app features using HTML, CSS, JS.

volunteer.summary: GitLab is an open source web-based DevOps lifecycle tool. I contribute to GitLab by fixing and implementing several features.
highlights: The second most MRs merged (57 MRs merged) of GitLab Hackathon Q2'2020. (Vue.js, Ruby on Rails)

volunteer.organization: BETIS by Computer Science Faculty's Student Council of Universitas Indonesia
volunteer.summary: BETIS (Bimbingan Belajar Gratis) is a free tutoring program from Computer Science Faculty's Student Council for high school students or equivalent to prepare the national college entrance examination (SBMPTN).

awards.title: Front-end Development Certification
awards.summary: Achieved “Front-end Development Certification” from freeCodeCamp at https://www.freeCodeCamp.org/gilangmlr. Created several projects to achieve the certification which hosted at https://codepen.io/gilangmlr
